languages.text: {n}Как только вы подходите, дворяне сгибаются в глубоком поклоне. Пришитые лица плотно обхватывают их черепа, а глаза блестят искренним подобострастием. Один решается заговорить с вами:{/n} "О, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, не откажите снизойти до нас! Услышав о вашем прибытии, мы с братом тут же вознамерились порадовать вас небывалым даром".

traits.locale_text: {n}Как только вы подходите, дворяне сгибаются в глубоком поклоне. Пришитые лица плотно обхватывают их черепа, а глаза блестят искренним подобострастием. Один решается заговорить с вами:{/n} "О, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, не откажите снизойти до нас! Услышав о вашем прибытии, мы с братом тут же вознамерились порадовать вас небывалым даром".

languages.text: {n}As you approach, the nobles bow gracefully. Their sewn-on faces are wrapped tightly around their skulls, and their eyes gleam with earnest subservience. One dares to address you:{/n} "O Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, grace us with your regard! When my brother and I heard of your arrival, we immediately sought to surprise you with an exceptional gift."
languages.original_text: {n}Как только вы подходите, дворяне сгибаются в глубоком поклоне. Пришитые лица плотно обхватывают их черепа, а глаза блестят искренним подобострастием. Один решается заговорить с вами:{/n} "О, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, не откажите снизойти до нас! Услышав о вашем прибытии, мы с братом тут же вознамерились порадовать вас небывалым даром".

traits.locale_text: {n}As you approach, the nobles bow gracefully. Their sewn faces are wrapped tightly around their skulls, and their eyes gleam with earnest subservience. One dares to address you:{/n} "O Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, grace us with your notice! When my brother and I heard of your arrival, we immediately sought to surprise you with an exceptional gift."

One dares to address you:{/n} "O Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, grace us with your regard! When my brother and I heard of your arrival, we immediately sought to surprise you with an exceptional gift."

One dares to address you:{/n} "O Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, grace us with your regard! When my brother and I heard of your arrival, we immediately sought to surprise you with an exceptional gift."

{n}As you approach, the nobles bow gracefully. Their sewn-on faces are wrapped tightly around their skulls, and their eyes gleam with earnest subservience. One dares to address you:{/n} "O Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, grace us with your regard! When my brother and I heard of your arrival, we immediately sought to surprise you with an exceptional gift."

languages.text: {n}当你靠近时，所有贵族都优雅地向你鞠躬。他们缝着的脸紧紧包裹在头上，目光中闪烁着真挚的顺从，其中一位贵族向你开了口。{/n}“噢！来自上界的大人！您的到来让我们不胜荣幸！当我和我哥哥得知您到来的消息时，我们立刻为您准备了惊喜，向您呈上一件特别的礼物。”
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, the nobles bow gracefully. Their sewn-on faces are wrapped tightly around their skulls, and their eyes gleam with earnest subservience. One dares to address you:{/n} "O Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, grace us with your regard! When my brother and I heard of your arrival, we immediately sought to surprise you with an exceptional gift."

traits.locale_text: {n}当你靠近时，所有贵族都优雅地向你鞠躬。他们缝着的脸紧紧包裹在头上，目光中闪烁着真挚的顺从，其中一位贵族向你开了口。{/n}“噢！来自上界的大人！您的到来让我们不胜荣幸！当我和我哥哥得知您到来的消息时，我们立刻为您准备了惊喜，向您呈上一件特别的礼物。”

languages.text: {n}近づくと、貴族たちは優雅に一礼した。縫い付けられた顔は頭蓋にぴったりと張りつき、彼らの目はひたむきな服従心に輝いている。一人が恐る恐る話しかけた。{/n}「おお、天の{mf|君|姫}よ、どうか我らにその御目をお向けくださいませ！私と兄弟は、あなた様のご到着を耳にするやいなや、特別な贈り物で驚かせようとすぐに手配いたしました」
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, the nobles bow gracefully. Their sewn-on faces are wrapped tightly around their skulls, and their eyes gleam with earnest subservience. One dares to address you:{/n} "O Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, grace us with your regard! When my brother and I heard of your arrival, we immediately sought to surprise you with an exceptional gift."

traits.locale_text: {n}近づくと、貴族たちは優雅に一礼した。縫い付けられた顔は頭蓋にぴったりと張りつき、彼らの目はひたむきな服従心に輝いている。一人が恐る恐る話しかけた。{/n}「おお、天の{mf|君|姫}よ、どうか我らにその御目をお向けくださいませ！私と兄弟は、あなた様のご到着を耳にするやいなや、特別な贈り物で驚かせようとすぐに手配いたしました」

languages.text: {n}Cuando te acercas a ellos, los nobles te saludan con una reverencia. La piel de sus rostros está estirada y cosida a sus cráneos, y tienen un brillo de sumisión total en la mirada. Uno de ellos se atreve a dirigirse a ti:{/n} «Oh, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, ¡concédanos el honor de su atención! Cuando mi hermano y yo nos enteramos de su llegada, nos propusimos sorprenderle con un excepcional obsequio».
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, the nobles bow gracefully. Their sewn-on faces are wrapped tightly around their skulls, and their eyes gleam with earnest subservience. One dares to address you:{/n} "O Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, grace us with your regard! When my brother and I heard of your arrival, we immediately sought to surprise you with an exceptional gift."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando te acercas a ellos, los nobles te saludan con una reverencia. La piel de sus rostros está estirada y cosida a sus cráneos, y tienen un brillo de sumisión total en la mirada. Uno de ellos se atreve a dirigirse a ti:{/n} «Oh, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, ¡concédanos el honor de su atención! Cuando mi hermano y yo nos enteramos de su llegada, nos propusimos sorprenderle con un excepcional obsequio».

languages.text: {n}Sen yaklaşınca soylular zarifçe eğiliyor. Dikili yüzleri, kafataslarına sıkıcı sarılmış; gözleri de ciddi bir itaatle parıldıyor. Biri sana hitap etmeye cüret ediyor.{/n} "Ey Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, teveccühünüzü bizden esirgemeyin! Kardeşim ve ben, gelişinizi duyar duymaz sizi sıra dışı bir armağanla şaşırtmak istedik."
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, the nobles bow gracefully. Their sewn-on faces are wrapped tightly around their skulls, and their eyes gleam with earnest subservience. One dares to address you:{/n} "O Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, grace us with your regard! When my brother and I heard of your arrival, we immediately sought to surprise you with an exceptional gift."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sen yaklaşınca soylular zarifçe eğiliyor. Dikili yüzleri, kafataslarına sıkıcı sarılmış; gözleri de ciddi bir itaatle parıldıyor. Biri sana hitap etmeye cüret ediyor.{/n} "Ey Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, teveccühünüzü bizden esirgemeyin! Kardeşim ve ben, gelişinizi duyar duymaz sizi sıra dışı bir armağanla şaşırtmak istedik."

languages.text: {n}Les nobles s'inclinent gracieusement à votre approche. Des visages cousus sont étirés sur leurs crânes et leurs yeux brillent d'une soumission sincère. L'un d'eux ose s'adresser à vous :{/n} « Ô, Votre Céleste Seigneurie, daignez, je vous prie, nous accorder un regard. Dès la nouvelle de votre arrivée, mon frère et moi avons immédiatement cherché à vous surprendre avec un cadeau exceptionnel. »
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, the nobles bow gracefully. Their sewn-on faces are wrapped tightly around their skulls, and their eyes gleam with earnest subservience. One dares to address you:{/n} "O Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, grace us with your regard! When my brother and I heard of your arrival, we immediately sought to surprise you with an exceptional gift."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les nobles s'inclinent gracieusement à votre approche. Des visages cousus sont étirés sur leurs crânes et leurs yeux brillent d'une soumission sincère. L'un d'eux ose s'adresser à vous :{/n} « Ô, Votre Céleste Seigneurie, daignez, je vous prie, nous accorder un regard. Dès la nouvelle de votre arrivée, mon frère et moi avons immédiatement cherché à vous surprendre avec un cadeau exceptionnel. »

languages.text: {n}Als du dich näherst, verneigen sich die Adeligen vornehm. Ihre aufgenähten Gesichter sind eng um ihre Köpfe geschlagen und in ihren Augen glänzt eine aufrichtige Unterwürfigkeit. Einer von ihnen wagt es, dich anzusprechen:{/n} "O {mf|himmlischer Herr|himmlische Herrin}, beehrt uns mit Eurer Anwesenheit! Als mein Bruder und ich von Eurer Ankunft erfuhren, wollten wir Euch umgehend mit einem außergewöhnlichen Geschenk überraschen."
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach, the nobles bow gracefully. Their sewn-on faces are wrapped tightly around their skulls, and their eyes gleam with earnest subservience. One dares to address you:{/n} "O Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, grace us with your regard! When my brother and I heard of your arrival, we immediately sought to surprise you with an exceptional gift."

Einer von ihnen wagt es, dich anzusprechen:{/n} "O {mf|himmlischer Herr|himmlische Herrin}, beehrt uns mit Eurer Anwesenheit! Als mein Bruder und ich von Eurer Ankunft erfuhren, wollten wir Euch umgehend mit einem außergewöhnlichen Geschenk überraschen."
